description.value: Thanks to your constant involvement with cryptic texts, you have attained an almost-supernatural ability to decipher complex codes and understand ancient writings. You can always use [[/act decipher-writing skill=occultism]]{Occultism} or [[/act decipher-writing skill=religion]]{Religion} when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Decipher Writing], no matter the subject matter. In addition, you can ignore language constraints when Deciphering Writing, and when you critically fail to Decipher Writing, you get a failure instead.
